Description: Used K-Means implementation from Python Data Science Handbook as reference.
Replaced synthetic make_blobs dataset with the penguins dataset from Seaborn.
Handled missing values by dropping NaNs and applied StandardScaler to normalize numerical features.
Selected bill_length_mm bill_depth_mm flipper_length_mm and body_mass_g for clustering.
Implemented the **Elbow Method** by computing WCSS for k=1 to k=10.
Trained KMeans(n_clusters=3) based on the optimal k from Elbow Method.
Calculated **Silhouette Score** to assess clustering quality.
Created a scatter plot of clustered data with centroids marked for better interpretation.
Added logging for dataset loading preprocessing training and evaluation steps.
Cleaned up code removed redundancies and improved efficiency.
